name: cloudfront-auth
description: An AWS Cloudfront Lambda@Edge function to authenticate requests using Google Apps, Microsoft, GitHub login, OKTA & Auth0

scripts.test: cd tests && npm install && cd .. && node tests/tests.js
scripts.build: npm install && cd build && npm install && cd .. && node build/build.js
scripts.build-ci: npm ci --production && cd build && npm ci --production && cd .. && node build/build.js

author: Widen Enterprises
